## Workspace-Specific Instructions
This is a mobile-first PWA built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Supabase for advanced scheduling and productivity automation.

## Project Summary
RE:MIND is a mobile-first web application designed for high-performance professionals who need absolute reliability and control over their schedules, court dates, meetings, and personal goals.

### Key Features:
- Multi-layer reminder system (14d/7d/3d/1d/2h/1h)
- Event categorization (Court, Work, Family, Personal, Recovery)
- Dashboard with daily/weekly/monthly views
- Push, SMS, and email notifications
- Landing page and sales page for monetization
- Progressive Web App (PWA) capabilities

### Tech Stack:
- Frontend: Next.js 15, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion
- Backend: Supabase (PostgreSQL, Auth, Realtime)
- Notifications: Twilio (SMS), SendGrid (Email), Web Push API
- Hosting: Vercel
- Payments: Stripe (scaffolding)
